summary: This document is an amendment to the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two, where the grantor, Jeffrey Epstein, modifies the beneficiaries of the trust. Specifically, it removes a previous beneficiary and adds Lawrence Visoski with a specified amount of one million dollars, contingent on his being alive at the time of distribution.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the grantor of the trust and is making amendments to the trust document.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.context: Lawrence Visoski is named as a beneficiary in the amendment to the trust, set to receive one million dollars if he is living.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is listed as a trustee who executed the amendment to the trust.

persons.name: Lawrence Newman
persons.context: Lawrence Newman is also listed as a trustee who executed the amendment to the trust.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein, as the grantor of the trust, has designated Lawrence Visoski as a beneficiary of the trust.
Darren K. Indyke and Lawrence Newman are both trustees who executed the amendment to the trust.

keyFacts: The document is an amendment to the Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two.
Lawrence Visoski is added as a beneficiary with a specified amount of one million dollars.
The amendment was executed on May 2, 2008.
Darren K. Indyke and Lawrence Newman are identified as trustees of the trust.
